Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: Gorgeous and beautiful place! They have a big choice of non-alcohol drinks and uh! the location! üòç So happy I had a chance to go there!

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: Talk about a tucked away little gem in Flevopark. Not yet overrun by tourists as it's a bit out of the way. Please do yourself a favor and try their Weissbier.

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: An hidden gem in Amsterdam. Cool distillery located in a park, close to a lake and in a beautiful building. Great to pass by and have a couple of beers. Only opens between 3 and 6pm so be mindful on when you plan to visit.

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: Really loved this distillery, which is built on a land that was once a water pumping station. There were around 100 varieties of local dutch junevers. THE hosts were amazing and had a great sense of humour. Great place for people looking for relaxed atmosphere that's pretty scenic and romantic.

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: The best spot to taste jenever and some beers!! Located inside Flevopark, this distillery is great to just sit back, put away your phone and enjoy the view... a nice hideaway from the hustle and bustle of Amsterdam

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: Delicious liquors and snacks in a top location at the Flevopark.

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: Great little spot in the middle of the gardens. Lovely staff!

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: An exceptionally good bar cum cafe. Tucked away in the heart of leafy Flevopark, this quaint little building stands alone near the water‚Äôs edge. Serving a superb array of homemade genevers, along with the expected fair, this local‚Äôs hideout ‚Ä¶

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text:
Very nice place, great drinks, open until
8PM only and self service but still great

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: This is my favourite place in Amsterdam amazing drinks and food.the park it's in is lovely to.

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: The spot is amazing, personnel is very friendly, try cherry liquor - supertasty!

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: Beautiful scenery from the city terrace and delicious liquors brewed on location. Very friendly personnel.

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: Wonderful spot in the middle of the park, not many food options on the menu though, but enough options for drinks!!

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: Worth a visit, if you don't like beer there's good wine and an amazing selection of  dutch gins and liquors.

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: Felt like you had come to paradise. Beautiful calm location where you enjoy some delicious cold beer during a hot day. When in Amsterdam you got to visit this place. Well worth the trip even that it is a bit away from the center of the city. But perfect if you have rented a bike.

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: An array of delicious liqueurs and the best genever I've found. The tradition is to pour a completely full glass on the bar and you are obligated to take a sip before picking it up. Lovely cozy place in the middle of Flevopark.

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: The genever is good, but the real appeal is the location. It's in the middle of a beautiful park, next to a lake, and you really have to take a bicycle to get there since it's outside the city center and the park itself is so large. You pass by some windmills on the way there, and the distillery feels so serene and secluded.

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: Don't skip this place and make sure you keep an eye out for tables near the water. Jenever is a must! Locals adore this place inserted in a lovely large park.

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text:
Quite a gem, always good to be back here once in a while.
They serve a collection of self made jenever/gin and plenty of other stuff.
Very kind staff/owners. ‚Ä¶

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text:
Gorgeous little location, low key and informal.

Veiws are incredible and staff are super friendly and happy to give ‚Ä¶

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: So worth the bike ride. Excellent choice on a beautiful day. Right in the middle of a park within a wooded area overlooking a lovely pond. Fantastic beer. Great snacks. Perfect!

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: Great little place hidden away in Flevo park. The jenever brewed is up there and mega tasty. The snacks are on point as proper Dutch quality.

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: Great venue, web pages needed a version in  English for me to  be better informed.  The service was good and the menu board certainly paid homage to Dutch Gin.  We were given a full description of the distillery room.  I enjoyed tasting the ‚Ä¶

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: Fantastic hidden terrace with excellent drinks and their own expertly distilled jenever.

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: Pleasant staff and clientele. Delicious drinks and fantastic view over the lake. Espresso is "meh".

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: A hidden gem this place! A nice romantic white little historic building in the middle of the big Flevo parc, situated at a pond where turtles live (let's hope those survived the winter)! They make their own typical Dutch jenevers, and ‚Ä¶

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: Time traveling is possible! At least here it is. This place flies you straight into the 1950's, mainly offering the traditional Dutch KOPSTOOT with LEVERWORST or plain salty peanuts! Who needs more than that, while enjoying one of the most ‚Ä¶

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: Historic pump house set on a pond. Local brewed jenever, cheese/kalbasa dishes, great for a sunny day to relax. Menu is in dutch (no english)!

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: Friendly staff, great service, delicious drinks and probably the best view in entire Amsterdam Oost.

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: Location is fantastic. Lovely place to have a late afternoon drink. Opening hours spotty at best. Do visit though. Definitely worth it!

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: Nice place , very friendly  barman , highly recommend

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: I love this place. They distill their own liquor which is real nice. Moreover, it is situated next to a little body of water which results in a very idyllic scenery.

Review Text: A bit hidden in the middle of the park. A nice place to just chill on the outside tables. Fine prices too for beer or Ginever.

Name: 't nieuwe diep
Review Text: Excellent genevers available. Outdoor terrace overlooks a large pond and is a tranquil place to spend an hour.
